author: Xu, SQ; Yang, JJ
adress: Nanjing Med Univ, Dept Anesthesiol Obstet & Gynecol, Nanjing, Jiangsu, Peoples R China
title: A Comparative Study of Bolus Norepinephrine, Phenylephrine, and Ephedrine for the Treatment of Maternal Hypotension in Parturients with Preeclampsia During Cesarean Delivery Under Spinal Anesthesia
